forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 5C. ESE winds at 5 to 10 km/h, increasing to 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 41F. ESE winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain in the morning, with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 40F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
